tool_description: This api generates sha256 hash of the given text
name: Hashing api
title: Hashing api

api_list.name: hash
api_list.description: This API can be used to generate SHA-256 hashes for various purposes, such as securing sensitive data or ensuring data integrity.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hashing-api3.p.rapidapi.com/hash.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hashing-api3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://hashing-api3.p.rapidapi.com/hash.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hashing-api3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
